description: Probably of North Germanic origin (Danish bøllebær), from Old Norse bolli (Proto-Germanic *bullǭ) + ber.

entries.meaning: Vaccinium myrtillus, the wild European blueberry of the cowberry family.
examples: Synonyms: blaeberry, fraughan, whort, whortle, whortleberry, whimberry

entries.meaning: The shrub of the above-mentioned plant.
